message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a good sum now than risk losing more with inflation.
I think we can both do better than that. I'm willing to split it 55/45, with me taking the larger share since I'm taking more of the inflation hit. Let's make this fair.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  My turn, and I'm proposing we split the difference of your offer last round.  It's more important to settle this quickly than to haggle.
